name: The Complete Fiction of H. P. Lovecraft
summary: The Complete Fiction of H.P. Lovecraft collects the author's novel, four novellas, and fifty-three short stories. Written between the years 1917 and 1935, this collection features Lovecraft's trademark fantastical creatures and supernatural thrills, as well as many horrific and cautionary science-fiction themes, that have influenced some of today's important writers and filmmakers, including Stephen King, Alan Moore, F. Paul Wilson, Guillermo del Toro, and Neil Gaiman.
info:
• 作者: Howard Phillips Lovecraft
  • 出版社: Chartwell Books; First Edition edition
  • 价格: $14.99
  • 发售日: 7月1日2016
  • 页数: 1112 pages

staff.name: 霍华德·菲利普·洛夫克拉夫特
